title: David Broadbent Appointed to Lead Combined SES Space & Defense Organization
summary: RESTON, Va.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--SES Space & Defense is pleased to announce the appointment of David Broadbent as President and CEO, effective July 17, 2025, as designated by the SES Space & Defense Proxy Board. His appointment coincides with the completion of SESs acquisition of Intelsat, marking a significant step in the integration of the two organizations.
